entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ARM64: Support for PAC-RET on Linux in .NET10 #109457
    10.0.0
  • Error: AOT Support throws the error "PublishTrimmed is implied by native compilation and cannot be disabled". #109452
  • Exception System.TypeLoadException in case of recursive generic parameter #109451
  • LdapConnection throws `LdapException: The feature is not supported` when using Negotiate or Kerberos authentication #109449
  • IOptionsMonitor.Current always go though ConcurrentDictionary getter - perf? #109446
    Future
  • IOptionsMonitor<T>.OnChange is fired whenever anything changes in IConfiguration - pit of failure #109445
    Future
  • CultureInfo on iOS doesn't have all the information that Windows or Android have. #109444
  • [mono] android crash #109443
  • Failed to initialize CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007000E when LimitNPROC=10 set via systemd unit #109442
  • Console.GetCursorPosition behaves oddly with multiple threads on WSL #109440
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/ELEMENT_TYPE_IU/u_array_merge_Target_64BIT_d/u_array_merge_Target_64BIT_d.cmd #109439

Closed

  • Add an `OrderedDictionary.TryAdd` overload that returns the `int`-based index of an entry if the key already exists #107947
    10.0.0
  • X500DistinguishedName with ForceUTF8Encoding causes Country encoded as UTF8String on .NET 8 Linux #109156
  • net8.0: Using unmanaged function pointer in a generic class throws "System.BadImageFormatException: Bad element type in SizeOf" #106997
    10.0.0
  • Trim analyzer produces unexpected IL2059 for nullable enum #109429
    10.0.0
  • Several IL20XX trim warnings missed by analyzers, only show up with ILC #109270
    10.0.0
  • Make SocksException(SR.net_socks_connection_failed) more informative #109404
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Extend `JsonIgnoreCondition` #66490
    10.0.0
  • The behavior of GC.Collect() in .Net8 is different with .Net Framework #109441

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: move QMARK expansion before morph #109469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clarifying instructions for GenerateReferenceAssemblySource target #109468
    area-Meta
  • Update Roslyn to 4.13.0-1.24510.9 #109467
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix BCE regression #109466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109458
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Upgrade our macOS build machines to the latest non-beta x64 image #109456
    needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0-staging] Upgrade our macOS build machines to the latest non-beta x64 image #109455
    needs-area-label
  • Upgrade our macOS build machines to the latest image #109454
    area-Infrastructure
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: Force using LDAP V3 for SASL binding #109450
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add regression testing for source generated with .NET 9 #109448
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Add support for UTF-8 in PemEncoding #109438
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Extend gdv chaining #109437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Update cgmanifest to align with the JSON schema #109453
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add TryAdd and TryGetValue overloads with `out int index` to OrderedDictionary #109324
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: account for newly unreachable blocks in morph #109394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve handling of encoding of X.520 attributes #109349
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] GetMethodDescData for jitted methods #109187
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix analyzer tracking of nullable enums #109430
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix missing analyzer warning for generics in containing type #109392
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Make SocksException more informative #109427
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add annotations and regression testing for members accessed by legacy schema generation. #109424
    area-System.Text.Json
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Set the ReferenceAssembly metadata on the manually added ReferencePath items #109433
    blocking, area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Switch config values to UTF8 #109418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Delete IL verification failure helpers in importer #108996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MonoVM] Improve thread state debugging and make it usable on Android #108401
    os-android, area-VM-threading-mono, community-contribution
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [draft] New decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Allow stack allocate objects in loops #106526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix file name buffer size for PAL's CreateProcess #109436
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109381
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Re-enable skiasharp WBT tests #109232
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [TestOnly] noop change #108158
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • use `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime` for rate limiter #109213
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CLI - dotnet workload restore fails on solution if there is a .esproj project #44587
  • Why does dotnet publish include files like Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.dll? #44579
  • Errors occur when run dotnet cli on Windows with sudo. #44576

Closed

  • [Aspire]: dotnet watch kills process tree on windows and does not let DCP cleanup containers #44542
    9.0.2xx
  • The Visual Studio version displays incorrectly on the SDK installer page. #44360

PullRequests

Created

  • Increase Arm64 test build timeout #44595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow ProjectReferences to not have the _GetRequiredWorkloads Target #44593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Agent sharing #44588
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Refactor source build tests to used common extracted sdk #44568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #44203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Prevent propagation of Ctrl+C to child processes #44565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove source build warn on diff test infra #44569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Gather test diag logging to track down nuget issue #44455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Browser refresh and WASM delta applier refactoring #44539
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • sln-list: Support for slnx #44537
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Forward port: Fix .net8 template #42635
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Formatting option to keep attribute on same line as method/function #75705
  • Allow Source Generation based on down stream project references #75703
  • Some struct layout cycles caused by static fields involving generics are not detected #75701
  • IDE0060 flags partial methods used by source generators #75700

PullRequests

Created

  • test remove workaround #75706
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Struct layout check – break an infinite generic expansion cycle that doesn’t include the target struct (a cycle at the end of the path) #75702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75696
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Fix flow of CompilerGeneratedFilesOutputPath from CPS #75674
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update PublishData.json #75704
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update global.json with updated msbuild version #75671
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce memory and CPU costs due to SegmentedList usage #75661
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #75699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #75698
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75697
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75589
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75591
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • VB: Recognize and check an `unmanaged` constraint #75665
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, 17.13
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Bind lambda in object initializer despite errors #75695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • MEF Export IServiceBroker #75694
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Include project diagnostic suppressors in host analyzer execution #75684
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make in memory assemblies in InteractiveAssemblyLoader can be collected when use scripting #74915
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged, Needs API Review

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: https, plaintext, updates #58752
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #58751
  • Too many of the same ACCELERATE KEYS (Alt+I) when creating a new project Blazor web app #58750
  • Exceptions from IHubActivator.Create are not being propagated to SignalR Client #58749
  • Compile Fails in 2022 Preview but works in 2022 #58748
  • Services injected with attribute derived from FromKeyedServicesAttribute appear as request body in swagger #58739
  • Introduce ability to disable response compression #58737

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #58665
  • Deprecated str.substr warning #58720
    10.0-preview1
  • Add a weather API call to the Blazor Web App template when global interactivity is enabled with WebAssembly/Auto #51204
    Backlog
  • Publishing Blazor WASM on .NET 8 Fails Due to Integrity Checks with Cloudflare Script Injection #58714
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #58707

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix local failure in GET_GracefulServerShutdown_AbortRequestsAfterHostTimeout #58747
    area-networking
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `df1544b` to `1204d63` #58746
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58745
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `9511905` to `9aeb12b` #58744
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58743
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `9511905` to `9aeb12b` #58742
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58741
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Remove GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #58738
    area-networking
  • Fix flaky ServerShutsDownGracefullyWhenMaxRequestBufferSizeExceeded #58735
    area-networking
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #58734
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Replaced Deprecated str.substr with str.substring in All Relevant Files #58732
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58466
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58510
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Correct typo in ProtectedPersonalDataAttribute.cs & PersonalDataAttribute.cs #58664
    area-identity, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HarmonyOS has a huge market in China, are you considering supporting it? #25639
  • Hot Reload does not seem to work #25637

Closed

  • MAUI iOS looking for obfuscar imeplementation doesn't works #25636
  • Update Notification Not Working Properly With Sideloaded Windows App | MAUI #25405
  • DataTrigger doesn't change Rectangle background color on iOS #25385

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140

    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [ci] Build public #24388
    area-infrastructure
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes (batching version) #24823
    do-not-merge, community ✨, t/perf
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #24036
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-flakiness, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Implement ScrollDownTo and ScrollUpTo methods in Appium #25601
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Reenable test ported from Xamarin.UITest #25624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should I use required modifier with navigations? #35031
  • Unable to create a migration for OracleDB #35030

Closed

  • Removing HierarchyId with existing migrations breaks compilation #35022
  • Ignore Other Global Query Filters during OnModelCreating #34986

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #35024 - Query could not be translated when using a static ICollection/IList field #35029

Updated

  • [release/9.0-staging TEST ONLY] adjusting some migration tests so that baselines dont depend on the product version #34977
    tell-mode
  • Update macOS images to 13 #35003
    blocked
  • Fix to #35007 - EF Core fails to translate LINQ query to SQL if JOIN contains multiple columns #35019
